MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML11 postcode area of Kirkfieldbank. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to carry out a permanent repair to an underground cable fault outside 284 Riverside Road, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:12pm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:18pm on Friday, 12th February 2021
